entries.title: Samsung starts building SSDs that could make laptops faster, more power efficient
entries.description: Dubbed the PM9C1a, the drive will feature support for the DICE security standard to protect against attacks.

entries.title: New Google Meet emoji reactions will let your co-workers know exactly how you feel
entries.description: Show off your emotions with new Google Meet emoji reactions.

entries.title: HBOMax just got more expensive and this is only the beginning
entries.description: HBOMax prices in the US just jumped $12 a year.

entries.title: Intel Core i9-13900KS is out – and 6GHz CPU isn’t quite as pricey as we expected
entries.description: After being a mysterious no-show at CES 2023, Intel’s supercharged Raptor Lake flagship is now on sale.

entries.title: Cisco says it's spotted more security flaws in its SMB routers
entries.description: Worries affect Cisco devices that have reached end of life, and as such will not be patched.

entries.title: AWS wants to helps big businesses and governments get to grips with blockchain
entries.description: AWS has partnered with Ava Labs as it gears up for a Web2-to-Web3 developer crossover.

entries.title: Surfshark to make users' tracking "twice as hard" thanks to new VPN feature
entries.description: Part of Surfshark's cutting-edge technology Nexus, Dynamic MultiHop will now improve the VPN security across its iOS apps

entries.title: iPhone users can say goodbye to email tracking with new Proton Mail update
entries.description: As over 160 billion emails sent every day contain invisible web trackers, Proton adds tracking protection to its iOS apps.

entries.title: VLC media player is being hiajcked to send out malware
entries.description: Someone's abusing VLC to launch side-loading attacks and deploy Cobalt Strike beacons to victims in Australia.

entries.title: Automattic's website ad tool could give Instagram and Facebook ads a run for its money
entries.description: Blaze tool was originally reserved for Tumblr until Automattic extended it to WordPress.com.

entries.title: Here’s how NVIDIA GeForce NOW is making 2023 the year of cloud gaming
entries.description: NVIDIA GeForce NOW continues to grow with more power and more games, and it’s got more to offer than ever in 2023.

entries.title: The illegitimate child of Resident Evil joins the PlayStation Plus Games catalog
entries.description: Some excellent games have been added to the PlayStation Plus’ January Games catalog.

entries.title: This Google Chrome security flaw could affect billions of users
entries.description: Threat actors could have accessed otherwise off-limits Google Chrome files.

entries.title: Bayonetta 3 patch improves gameplay, but the Nintendo Switch still holds it back
entries.description: Bayonetta 3's latest patch boasts a number of solid gameplay improvements, but the game's performance remains shaky.

entries.title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – everything we know so far
entries.description: James Cameron’s Avatar is making its way from the silver screen to console and PC. Here's everything we know about Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora so far.

entries.title: Native American group urge Apache to change its name
entries.description: Apache has once more been challenged about its name, and urged by Native American groups to reconsider.

entries.title: Apple Music and Apple TV are now on Windows 11, but with some catches
entries.description: Preview versions of Apple’s Music and TV apps have landed, but you might want to wait a little longer before you download them.

entries.title: Your next security incident could be just down to bad communication
entries.description: Miscommunication between teams often results in costly security incidents that deteriorate work performance.

entries.title: This ChatGPT rival lets you talk to anyone, dead or alive
entries.description: Character.AI allows you to strike up a conversation with almost any person – dead or alive, fictional or otherwise.

entries.title: Samsung adds Spatial Audio recording to Galaxy phones (with the right earbuds)
entries.description: The 360 Audio Recording update is available today if you have the Galazy Z Flip 4 or Fold 4 and Galaxy Buds Pro 2.

entries.title: Ignore the haters, Apple – I’d love a touchscreen MacBook
entries.description: I can’t wait to get my grubby fingerprints all over a touchscreen MacBook.

entries.title: Touchscreen Macs could mark the end of iPad - so what could it use for macOS?
entries.description: With the struggles of Stage Manager on iPadOS ongoing, touchscreen Macs could be a sign that it's the end.

entries.title: Windows 11 Start menu gets a mysterious new feature – but you’ll have to search for it
entries.description: The latest patch for Windows 11 has made a surprise introduction that’s mysteriously hidden.

entries.title: Raspberry Pi could be taking some big leaps forward in 2023
entries.description: Raspberry Pi CEO discusses bulk buying, pop-up shops and more.

entries.title: The Oculus Quest 2 is getting a much-needed fitness upgrade
entries.description: The Oculus Quest 2 and Meta Quest Pro are getting heart rate monitoring and compatibility with Android's Helath Connect.

entries.title: Netflix's Lockwood and Co. looks like Ghostbusters for the Gen Z generation
entries.description: The official trailer for Lockwood and Co., Netflix's new supernatural thriller series, has landed online.

entries.title: Garmin may finally catch up with this key Apple Watch heart health feature
entries.description: Garmin watches may finally be getting a feature that Apple Watches have sported for years.

entries.title: Twitter says leaked user data wasn't stolen from its systems
entries.description: Twitter claims no evidence of vulnerability abuse as huge cache of user data circulates online.

entries.title: Gamers take note: AMD Ryzen 7000X3D CPUs could go on sale February 14
entries.description: The only thing that remains unknown is how much these pepped-up processors will cost.

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra could have four key upgrades over the S22 Ultra
entries.description: A leaker has outlined four upgrades we'll apparently get on the S23 Ultra, while elsewhere S23 marketing shots have leaked.

entries.title: What is Wordle? Rules, strategy and everything you need to know
entries.description: Everything you need to know about Wordle, including the rules, how to win and more.

entries.title: 'There's more story to tell': Netflix's Vikings Valhalla could return after season 3
entries.description: Vikings Valhalla's showrunner suggests that the Netflix series' third season might not be its last.

entries.title: Microsoft is giving all its workers unlimited holiday
entries.description: Salaried US workers given unlimited time off by Microsoft.

entries.title: New Android 13 beta lets you customize app icons in a way it always should have
entries.description: The rather humble update includes new partial screen sharing menu and updates to past beta features.
